actions: Clears the Heart, opens the Orifices aromatically, awakens the Spirit, vaporizes Phlegm, clears the Liver and relieves Fire toxicity.
Warmly unblocks, vigorously purges, drives out water, reduces edema and breaks up clogged Phlegm.
With Zhu Sha and Niu Huang, for Phlegm Misting the Orifices.
Sedates the Heart, calms the Spirit, expels Phlegm, sedates jitteriness and clears Heat.
Clears Heat, purges Fire, relieves toxicity and expels Phlegm.
Tonifies the Qi of the Lungs, Spleen and Intestines, stops restlessness, stops thirst and generates fluids.

symptoms: In severe cases: Mania Hemoptysis Hematemesis Epistaxis
manifestations.tongue: Red tip and edges or Purplish

contraindications: Use with extreme caution. Vomiting and diarrhea often occur after ingestion.
Use Cinnabaris Zhu Sha with extreme caution for those with compromised Liver and Kidney functions. Do not use it in large amounts or for a prolonged period.
